description: Try our easy to follow Pulled Pork With Sweet Capsicum & Black Beans recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pulled Pork With Sweet Capsicum & Black Beans
name: Pulled Pork With Sweet Capsicum & Black Beans Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Meanwhile, simmer the sauce mixture for 10 minutes or until slightly thickened. Serve pork and a little sauce in tortillas with sour cream and coriander.
